## STAT 545A

```{r, echo = FALSE, results='asis'}
oo545 <- suppressMessages(read_csv(here("content", "officehours-545a.csv")))
oo545 %>% 
	mutate(Date = mdy(Date),
		   Day  = wday(Date, label = TRUE)) %>% 
	select(Person, Day, Date, Time, Place) %>% 
	arrange(Date, Time) %>% 
	kable()
```
